text: [Music]
well um just uh I've completed my basic
law studies from The Faculty of law of
Delhi University and then I I was
working at the national Human Rights
Commission in India for a year after
which I got the road scholarship to go
to Oxford I did my masters in law at the
University College Oxford after which I
got got admission to the Harvard Law
School where I completed my llm and I
briefly worked at a New York law firm
for a year after which I decided to move
into Academia I was a visiting fellow at
NYU Law School after that and then I did
some teaching and research in Japan uh
after which around in from middle of
2002 onwards I have been in Hong Kong
for the last over 5 years and and that
was that's my essentially in my academic
background
